description: Sard Antibacterial Washing Machine Cleaner 5 in 1 deep clean action, 2 TreatmentsExperience the 5 dimension of a clean washing machine with Sard Antibacterial* Washing Machine Cleaner 5 in 1 deep clean action:1. Antibacterial: removes bacteria in your washing machine* (*Tested on E.Coli and S. Aureus)2. Removes Limescale: removes the limescale collected overtime in vital parts of the machine3. Provides Freshness: freshens all vital parts of the machine4. Removes Dirt & Residues: removes the dirt and detergent residues inside the drum and door seal5. Prevents Malodour: the powder provides a deel cleaning action of the washing machine preventing malodourSuitable for front & top loader, It comes with 2 treatments in pack.Unleash the power of powder with Sard Washing Machine Cleaner 5in1 for a deep clean washing machine.Antibacterial*Removes Dirt & ResiduesRemoves LimescalePrevents MalodourProvides Freshness2 Powder Treatments
name: Sard Washing Machine Cleaner Antibacterial Disinfectant 2 Pack
